name: tlcmap-convictions
description: Code to convert Alana Piper's convictions data to RO-Crate - a start on the TLCMap project.

scripts.small: node index.js -a additional-context.json  -p CourtsCoordinates.xlsx  -d SampleData/ -s SampleData/SampleDataPrisonRecords.xlsx small-crate && node  ./node_modules/ro-crate-html-js/roc-static-html.js -c config/convictions.config.json small-crate/ && node ./node_modules/ro-crate-html-js/roc-schema.js --html small-crate/ > vocab.html

author: Peter Sefton
